title: The scourge of Venus: or, The wanton lady With the rare birth of Adonis. Written by H.A.
author: Ovid, 43 B.C.-17 or 18 A.D.
publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes dwelling neere Holborne-bridge,
notes: A translation in verse of: Ovid's story of Myrrha and Cinyras in book 10 of the Metamorphoses; ascribed to Henry Austin.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
